website_summaries.verdict: If you want inexpensive sun protection for your back and shoulders, this short-sleeve rashguard is hard to beat.
pros: Short-sleeve swim tee with raglan seams and screen print at side waist
cons: Do not put in the dryer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!!! It fit as expected. It was perfect, didn't ride up while snorkeling, and no sun burn. The only complaint is that it is slightly see through when wet. I am size 38DDD and weigh 183 lbs. I ordered the xl
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: My go-to shirt
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these because I was sick of burning and having to worry about having someone put sunscreen on me every hour while on vacation. It works great! I have ordered 2 more since. I'm 5'6" and 145lbs and I ordered a large and it fits perfect. I swim in it, go on excursions, lay on the beach. Sometimes I wear my bathing suit top under it and sometimes a one-piece under it. I love that I can wear it out throughout the day as a normal shirt then just hop in the water if I want to.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Liked this so much I bought one in a different ...
customer_reviews.text: Liked this so much I bought one in a different color. Like others have posted, it's not skin tight which is nice. Fabric dries quick and moves easily with your body if you swim in it. I've used it several times and it seems to be holding up well. I do not put it in the washing machine though. I hand wash it in the sink. I ordered a medium and found it to be true to size. I'm 5'6, 140 lbs with broad shoulders and an athletic build.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel NunlistTop Contributor: Swimming

customer_reviews.title: Decent but the design peels off
customer_reviews.text: I’m kind of torn on this. I ordered it for my daughter (she needs a two piece for better support and convenience of restroom breaks while playing in the water, but who wants an 11 year old looking like they are 25?!?!?). She is 5’2” and a 120 pounds, and it fits a little loose (small size ordered). It was really cute and comfortable for her. But my only complaint was the little design on the side start peeling off after about an hour in the pool. So if you are ordering it for the design then I wouldnt suggest it. If you are ordering it for a little more coverage for active water play, then it’s pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Rashguards are hard to buy online...it is one of those items that you just have to take a leap of faith on...and I am glad I did with this shirt! The fit was exactly what I was looking for and the image is really cute. It does not fit too tight around the waist area, let's be honest...no one wants to look like a stuffed sausage. I am 5' 10' and usually wear a large because I am tall and long in the torso (most shirts end up looking like belly shirts-not good) and I have plenty of coverage. I would recommend this shirt!
customer_reviews.author: J Green

customer_reviews.title: Not the exact color I was expecting, but still great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this swim shirt in pink a couple of years ago and love it so much, I decided to buy another one for a cruise I'm going on soon. It fits great and looks good on (you'll need to wear a bikini top or sports bra underneath, though, since it's fairly thin/potentially see-through when wet), but the color I received is not what I was expecting based on what I ordered. I thought "Aqua" would be more blue/turquoise, based on the pictures in the listing, but it's actually light green/sea foam colored instead. A little disappointing, but will still be using!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Decal comes off in water, but otherwise cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute. My daughter (who dislikes skimpy bathing suits as well as unnecessary sun exposure) liked it. Things to consider: this is truly a swim shirt- and as such there is no support or shelf bra. Might be an issue for some. When you get out of the water the shirt suctions to you- as you can imagine, it’s kinda a revealing silhouette. Again, might be an issue for some people- just things to consider. It’s functional and does provide sun protection. One note about quality- the cute decal on the front came right off in the pool- first use. So that was a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: LightRaven

customer_reviews.title: Good sun protection,  stretchy and bright color
customer_reviews.text: Good sun protection pretty color but the mock neck is just a little uncomfortable. Assuming it's this style for extra protection but it just feels a bit restrictive to me. But its stretchy so not hard to get on. If you have an issue with turtlenecks though this wouldn't be the cut for you. For info, I'm 5'9, 130lbs and 34 C. The medium fit good and came down low enough to not feel short and wasn't tight. If I wanted it to fit super close like a rash guard I would have purchased a small. But I got it for sun protection and nothing else
customer_reviews.author: Woobookat

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Comfortable, fits tight in sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Overall it fits well and looks cute. I'm an average fit build, 5'3" 120lbs, and the small was a loose fit like a generic adult small usually is on me but the sleeves were tight, so it made for a slightly awkward look. I just wore it paddle boarding so it wasn't a big deal. It does a great job at blocking the sun and staying cool while wicking away sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay A.

customer_reviews.title: This does the job. It's not the most flattering ...
customer_reviews.text: This does the job. It's not the most flattering swim shirt (but i have yet to find one!) I am a size 8/10 and got the Medium/
customer_reviews.author: Mama2Be

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Got a sunburn, wore this the next day to prevent it from getting worse. I’m 5’7, 190, 36DD and the XL fit fine. It was a little tight across the shoulders when I first put it on, but once I was in the water it didn’t feel tight at all. I was able to swim normally and paddle a boogie board without any trouble. I also appreciate that it doesn’t ride up my back! My only concern is that it seems to have a few pulls in it after just one wear, hoping that this isn’t a sign that it will soon unravel.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great rash guard for the money. Sewn well and the fabric feels substantial. I usually wear a medium and I ordered a medium, but I kind of wish I would have sized up to be a little looser. The arms are super tight on me and I don't have very large arms. It fits well in the chest and I'm not large there, if you are and don't want it super tight you may want to size up. All and I I really like it and the pink color is cute
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: Fabric good, fit not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Fabric was sleek and very thin. The length was long but fit more snug than I would like. Shows every lump and bump. Not flattering if you aren't well built.
customer_reviews.author: Noel M Chancery

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: kept me from getting sunburnt, but the design is already peeling off after a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Harris

customer_reviews.title: Been wearing daily all summer in a pool
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this rash guard daily in chlorinated pools for the past month and it's been working great, it has not stretched out yet. However, like all white rash guards I've owned, it is turning yellow. I've been rinsing it out after swimming and treating it with anti-chlorine soap, but I think it's just one of those things. Still, it's hardly noticeable and still looks cute. I love the design on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Nova7o9

customer_reviews.title: Great modest choice!
customer_reviews.text: I love this swim tee! Its not skin tight like rashgaurds. Its also a lot longer than most so you don't have to worry about that either! Its so cute and very fashionable! Great choice for someone who wants to be modest but still look cute!
customer_reviews.author: Keymomx2

customer_reviews.title: great protection for hours in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an affordable looser fitting rash guard for my trip to Florida and this fit the bill. I ordered one size bigger than my usual T-shirt size and it is not clingy, but also not baggy. I'm very fair skinned, so the UV ray protection was another plus for ordering this. I wore this both times I went to the beach and ran about 8 miles in it. I didn't submerge myself in the water (just waded in), so I can't offer feedback on how it would do after several hours of getting wet, but definitely served its purpose well for me after hours sweating in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: mwh127

customer_reviews.title: Order was what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I have a history of skin cancer in the family and really enjoy the beach. I had a slight sunburn the other day even with proper lotion. I purchased this shirt and it came within two days which I loved. I am a large and ordered a large. It fit well and had a bit of room in it. It didn't balloon in the pool which was really nice. The neck was higher than expected but I certainly don't mind having to apply more sunscreen! It worked well and I am very happy with the purchase. Being older I prefer to wear a bra as it is more comfortable. I could easily do this with this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color, but for someone with narrow shoulders
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 5' 103 lb woman and I ordered an XS. The length was perfect, but the arms were tight (& I don't have big arms). It fit, but I didn't know how that "tightness" would play out when I was paddleboarding and really moving my arms around. The pink is a really pretty summer/beach/bright pink, but not neon. Cute rash guard; I wish it would have fit. This one will have to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: William Harris

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The product is not made with very good material nor its decorations. The white decorations came off after only one wearing. They just peeled off on its own even before washing it. After only one washing, the material began to "dissolve", meaning it began to come apart in its weaving. This product is extremely poorly made with extremely poor materials. I highlydo not recommend it. Will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Joon K.

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Kept me from getting a sunburn (or worsening the sunburn I got while I went without it) while vacationing in the Caribbean. Definitely worth the money for the protection! So much easier than trying to remember to reapply sunscreen all the time (which is hard to do, and doesn’t work well when you’re sweaty). I’m so very glad I listened to recommendations and took this with me!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Not fashionable, but practical
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is a snug fit, as expected for a swim shirt. The neckline is a little higher than I like, and the stitching bunches up around my neck a bit, giving the shirt a slightly odd appearance, but at least it doesn't allow water in and then billow around my body in the water. The pool where I swim tends to be chilly and this shirt is thick enough to lend some much needed warmth. A decent item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ACTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased that this shirt fit as expected! I can hardly wait for the weather to warm up, and be able to see what kind of protection from the sun’s rays it provides. It was recommended to me by a friend!
customer_reviews.author: jkrall

customer_reviews.title: Not great printing quality!
customer_reviews.text: The design started peeling off after 1 day in the pool! The shirt is great, just the screen printing is awful!! It looks like we've had it for years, and it's been worn once. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Holsworth

customer_reviews.title: Too tight and neck is extremely small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt for kayaking and paddle boarding. I bought a large based on the reviews. The length and appearance is good but I found it too tight and the neck is way to small and constricting. This is probably only made for tiny teens or junior size girls. Unfortunately I missed the return window or I would send it back
customer_reviews.author: Little Alum

customer_reviews.title: Quality shirt but decoration peels off right away
customer_reviews.text: The rash guard itself is nice. We sized up so it wouldn’t be too tight in the neck. But after two months and only a few uses the decoration is already peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: MommaCX3 ☀️❤️

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Lasted a month. Falling apart. Elastic coming through, print falling off. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: @krista26.2

customer_reviews.title: The color is vibrant and the rest of the shirt fits great, it will get lots of use here in ...
customer_reviews.text: The only downside is the neck is just a little tight. The color is vibrant and the rest of the shirt fits great, it will get lots of use here in Florida and on the cruise we are taking, great for water aerobics and just as good or better for scooting around town. The fabric breathes. Did I mention that it travels great, easy to hand wash, light to pack and doesn't significantly wrinkle.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rain

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This shirt was good for the price. I’m 5’7”, 145 lbs. and bought a small. I’ve worn it multiple times snorkeling in Hawaii, it’s good protection from the sharp rocks and the sun. The only reason I gave it 4 stars was because the design started to peel off after a few wears. The neck and sleeves are snug, but not uncomfortably so.
customer_reviews.author: A. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Arms are too tight but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers stated it runs small. For me, my biggest issues were the arms, they were way too tight. While I don't have huge arms, they are not sticks either. LOL! I ordered the next size up and they were still tight but managable. Other than that I love the look of it. Hopefully it will help keep my very light skin from getting burned while on vacation and over the summer. If it were not for the tight arms I would have given it 5 stars. Unless you have skinny arms - order up a size or two.
customer_reviews.author: W. Adams

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is happy w/ it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is still on the cusp of kid's sizes, so it was a kinda big, but that was expected and she liked the bagginess. For a grown woman tho, it might be a little tight through the chest, depending on your size! The color was true to the picture, vibrant blues (which my kid loves). No sunburn and fewer fights about sunscreen on the beach, so can't beat that. Would love to find a matching bottom.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaStuff

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a large so I ordered an xl hoping for some more room. It was a good choice, snugger than I'd hoped for but still very comfortable. I really like that it is a good length for me. I'm 5'10" and it can cover must of me butt if I pull it down. Others mentioned the design coming off. I washed as a gentle and hung to dry and no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: I got an XL and it wont even fit my ...
customer_reviews.text: I got an XL and it wont even fit my size medium daughter. The product says tighter fit. It was so tight in the arms. I will be returning this asap
customer_reviews.author: J. Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy material
customer_reviews.text: The material is rough and scratchy, even after washing. Which is disappointing as the shirt is flattering and adorable. I ordered based on their size chart and it fits perfectly. Testing upf tomorrow at the pool. I won’t wear it often due to the scratchy material.
customer_reviews.author: Amch

customer_reviews.title: If you're after this for the screen print, don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, fits nice. Unfortunately, after wearing it for only a half hour, the decal started peeling off. Of course the whole thing didn't peel off at once, which makes it even more annoying to be wandering around with half a design on.
customer_reviews.author: S. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt to protect your skin while in sun
customer_reviews.text: This is my second shirt of this kind perfect for when you’re gonna be out in the sun all day to protect your skin!! I have worn out on the boat in Mexico and all day at the pool in Arizona. I did size up because it does fit snugly. I’m 5’8 and 130 pounds and I went with a size medium.
customer_reviews.author: DevonMarieC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what I expected, except the neck & arms.
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a med-lg size, but I know from experience that most things made to fit closer to the body run small, so the XL was perfect, giving some room; wasn't close to body, but...the arms and neck are just right. If I had ordered a smaller size the arms & neck would've been too tight. So, I think the proportion of the rash guard should be adjusted so the arms & neck match the looseness of the body part, for the size.
customer_reviews.author: FireFly

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL FOR SIZE LARGE WOMAN
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a large so I ordered an XL. I could not pull over my chest. Way too small, not sure if these are Asian sizes or if rash guards typically run really small or if my chest is too big for this brand. XL was as large as they went to so I have to return without exchange.
customer_reviews.author: yodery

customer_reviews.title: True to size!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5 and weigh 145lbs. I ordered a size medium as most buyers stated the rash guard ran small and I wish I hadn't. It's actually really true to size. I normally wear a small in misses clothing. The medium offered plenty of extra room even with my bikini worn underneath. I ordered the gray with the flowers on the side and I love the color which coordinates nicely with my white with black striped bottoms. Can't wait to go zipping down the waterslides with my back protected from road rash. Love it so much I might order another color in a size small.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Runs small but great shirt
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty tight. I have another one I bought at a beach store and it’s more loose. I would like to find something in between Not too tight but not loose. This worked for what I needed it for and helped protect against sunburn but ran small. Love the color
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: No Sunburn, Kept Cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear to the beach and snorkeling to ensure that I would not get a sunburn spending many hours in the water and sun. It totally did the trick! And not only did I not get sunburned, it also once wet kept me cool in the Florida heat and humidity. I'm 5'5", ~185lbs and the X-Large fit perfectly. Color is true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: AMP78

customer_reviews.title: Well-built and affordable rashguard
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this rashguard shirt for a trip to Hawaii. She burns really easily and wanted to avoid having to re-sunscreen 3 times a day. Well, she absolutely loved her Kanu Surf Women's Breeze Rashguard. She wore it while playing in the water but also when simply sitting on the beach. The rashguard is well built and uses good quality material. Best of all, my wife says that the fit is not too tight - kind of half way between a t-shirt and a tight wet suit. It is really affordable and she highly recommends it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: JL Lavoie

customer_reviews.title: This is a good deal for a rash guard
customer_reviews.text: This is a good deal for a rash guard; however, it’s not my favorite. I ordered a medium and I’m pretty sure a small would fit better. The medium fits well around my arms but it is loose around my torso. From what i can tell, it seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: It fits well and as expected. I don't think they run small. I think they ran exactly as the American sizes are supposed to run. My daughter is 130lb 5'4 and wear large on tops. It fit her just right. The material and color is just like the picture. Arrived early and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Its okay, yet the opening for the head, ...
customer_reviews.text: Its okay, yet the opening for the head, the trim is too much/big. Fits odd around armpits and bust fir being small for 34B. Is a bit stretchy. Sun portection? Works wonders, yet keep in mind to follow the wash tag; for if you don't hand wash it you may wash out the uv protection.
customer_reviews.author: ADMC

customer_reviews.title: Nice and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered 3 of these now over the past 6 years. Finally decided to write a needed review. This is a great product. It fits as expected. Snug enough to be comfortable at the beach. Just loose enough to not feel tight. The pattern does wear off quickly but the shirt itself protects my skin from the sun very well. Living in FL I use it frequently and wash it frequently. it holds up nicely. Each lasts me at least a full swim season sometimes 2.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lister

customer_reviews.title: I had to take in like 4-8 inches
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because it was WAY too big. I had to take in like 4-8 inches! I am a 36DDD bust, natural waist is about 30 in. Get a size or two smaller! I posted pics of AFTER I took it in. Quality is great especially for price! This rashguard's tag says it was originally $34!!! That's pretty average for rashguards too. Worth it, just size down!!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen M.

customer_reviews.title: This is such a comfortable shirt!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this shirt. The fabric is very comfortable when wet, not heavy at all. It has a nice feminine shape, and it dries in a jiffy. If you are trying to decide if a medium or a large size is for you, choose the medium. I'm questioning how much SPF the fabric is capable of since I'm tanning through the shirt during my 1 hour aqua-fit class - but no burning.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Salley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr olde doesnt like to show skin and kept going to the beach in t shirts that would get heavy when wet, so I bought her this and it is much more appropriate for swimming. Dp recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mariann H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rash Guard
customer_reviews.text: I have large upper arms and I was afraid that would be too tight. It did feel tight, but once it gets wet once it's fine. I bought this to wear snorkeling on a trip to Jamaica to avoid polluting the reefs with more sunblock than necessary, and this really did the job. I wore it with and without a bikini top underneath and never felt self-conscious.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: this rash guard has a nice fit not too snug. also it is not see through and it has a good length specially for people on the tallish side. i'm 5'7". I use it for swimming to protect from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: lisandra

customer_reviews.title: They fit true to size and not skin tight, ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit true to size and not skin tight, but not baggy either. I am 5'6", 141 lbs., 36"-28"-38" and bought all 3 in a size Medium. But returned because it didn't have the white graphics on the side. It was just a plain white rash guard.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Super tight
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would get this to wear over my bathing suit so my shoulders and back don't burn. But I was disappointed as it is snug. There is no way this is an adult extra-large! It might fit my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Good rashguard
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that would prevent me from getting additional sun on my chest and upper arms. Wearing a t-shirt is uncomfortable and clumsy when wet. This fit very nice, not too tight. The only issue is that you will need support underneath (no breast support AT ALL!) I wore a comfortable sports bra. The color and style are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: ADG

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is 14 and pretty tall. Bought sizing based on her bust size (32-24) but it was too tight. Gave it to anther granddaughter who is smaller and younger. Seems to fit her fine though she doesn't like to full cover up effect that much. Hopefully though she'll get some use out of it. Better than all that suntan lotion.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaM

customer_reviews.title: Screen printed pattern on front fell off
customer_reviews.text: It is a functioning swim shirt. That is an indisputable fact. The screen printed pattern on the lower left front of the shirt, completely fell off on its first use. So to summarize, shirt is not bad, pattern on front is not good. The pattern is what made it cute enough for my daughter to want.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Love this swim tee
customer_reviews.text: Love this swim tee!!! It is just what I was looking for to wear while boating to minimize my sun exposure. Should provide good cover against skin cancer without layers of sticky sunscreen! It is stretchy like a swimsuit, and covers all the parts you don't want to get sunburned. Looks sporty and athletic (much nicer than the soggy tee shirt I have been wearing over my suit). Also more flattering in the midsection than my old swimsuit since it is so stretchy--better to order a little large than too small. Cute design and gorgeous color!
customer_reviews.author: JWP

customer_reviews.title: Great rashguard, reasonably priced too.
customer_reviews.text: The length is longer, like shown in the picture, so I just bunch it up higher onto my hips. The print is vinyl but does not tear or peel when the shirt is stretched. Before getting this, my shoulders would burn and peel despite spf50. Now I've been out with this rashguard on and no more burning.
customer_reviews.author: Chel7

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really nice top BUT RUNS VERY SMALL. I wear a large or extra large and ordered the XL but it fits like a medium. But it’s pretty and I like the style
customer_reviews.author: C. Doherty

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat small in size. Pretty tight. I'd recommend ordering a size up. I know it's supposed to be fitted, but I don't need anything clinging to my belly button. Otherwise, it's a good rashguard. No sunburns for me. Kept me cool in extreme heat.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great protectiong a little large but tight fitting.  overal love it.
customer_reviews.text: I wear my swim shirt over my swimsuit to protect myself from the sun. It works extremely well for protection from the sun. My small child also holds onto it and I am less worried about showing off at the beach-pools. I do not have to put on as much sunblock which saves money. I am very independent and most swimsuits do not protect a women back. This shirt really helps me go out with my child and not have to worry about getting burned.
customer_reviews.author: J and H

customer_reviews.title: Cute but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved this rash guard, however I've owned it for one month and I've taken it into the water a handul of times. The design started peeling off today. I bought this one because I liked the design and the way it adds a feminine look so now I'm very disappointed in the quality of this product :( and the last day Amazon would have allowed me to return it was yesterday, nice.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Neck too high and tight
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’8” and 170 pounds. Size large fit well. I also liked the color and the printed design. I did not like the neckline. It came up to high and felt too restrictive. Almost like a mock turtleneck. I would prefer more of a crew neck. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Doht

customer_reviews.title: it will fit like a slightly fitted t-shirt
customer_reviews.text: As the description says - this is a swim tee (not a rash gaurd). Thus, it will fit like a slightly fitted t-shirt. For reference I am petite (5'2", 32A-B chest) and ordered the size x-small. Will probably be using this as a coverup at the beach and not necessarily for snorkeling outings since it is slightly loose. I will update the review if it does not meet my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Weird binding at neck
customer_reviews.text: The look is cute but the neckline is really wonky. Instead of laying flat, it sticks out from body. It is very form fitting, I’m 5’4” and around 120 lbs. it borders on being too tight across the chest and under the arms. It is also very long, it comes down to my thighs.
customer_reviews.author: HerMaj

customer_reviews.title: bought multiple sizes
customer_reviews.text: I have about 3 of these shirts in different sizes, but the small fits me well. I use it for bjj and it helps with neck marks or gi burn because the surfer style neck is a bit higher and covers some of my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us fair skin skinned ladies!
customer_reviews.text: I have super fair skin that doesn't tan. Wore this this and it worked great. Also bought the long sleeve one and I would alternate between them. Cute fit without being too tight. I ordered the medium because I needed the extra room in the chest area due to being a 34DD fit great!
customer_reviews.author: MTNGAL71

customer_reviews.title: good quality, sizing off
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I know that swim shirts are supposed to be form fitting....however, it was snug! I decided to remove to collar, cut open and resew the neckline to give me breathing room. I HATE things too tight up to my neck. After doing this it worked out great. If you don't mind something tight around your neck line, then it will be fine. The material is well made, and I loved the color and design. I wear a size 4-6, bought a medium, and found it snug in the neck, and arms.
customer_reviews.author: The Michigan Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fits small
customer_reviews.text: I amd a boarder line small medium. I ordered a medium and it fits like a xsmall. I gave it to my daughter since she is a xxsmall and it fits her better than me.
customer_reviews.author: lady j

customer_reviews.title: Buy up a full size
customer_reviews.text: Neck hole is small. I am thin with thin arms. I wear a small/medium normally and the medium was too tight in the neck hole and arms.
customer_reviews.author: LJMom

customer_reviews.title: I like the fabric
customer_reviews.text: I received this shirt yesterday in addition to one in the Lagoon color. First of all, I like the fabric, and the colors are nice and vibrant. But...the fit is too snug. Going by numerous other reviews, I ordered up a size and got the large. The fabric is too snug around my waist, and also the neck fits tighter than I like. Because I don't think a larger size will help with the neck issue, these shirts are going back today.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Wolterman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed. I am pasty white and burn easily. This fit perfect as well. I am 5’6 and about 165 pounds I ordered a large. My only complaint is that my dog had his life jacket on and the Velcro from his jacket snagged it in a couple places, no fault of the swim shirt or the company.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fitting rashguard
customer_reviews.text: I like that this fits as expected and it was the color I intended. I can wear it as a shirt or bathing suit top but would still need to wear another bikini underneath for support.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good SPF board shirt
customer_reviews.text: This shirt fulfilled it's purpose. As someone with very pale skin, I needed a high-protection SPF shirt for a recent trip to Puerto Rico. With all the time spent in the sun, this shirt kept me from burning. I also like that it matches almost everything. Cons: The neck it s bit too high for my taste and I wasn't quite satisfied with the overall fit, although I did order a size up, so that may have been my own fault. But for the price, this shirt served its function, which was keeping my pale skin pale.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Good-order size up or two
customer_reviews.text: Bought XL in pink, it fit perfect. I'm usually a size medium in shirts and 32G chest. I didn't want this tight since I have a mom tum. Wore to splash park with boys. It is not SPF though as advertised. My shoulders were a little rosy so be careful if surfing or something all day!
customer_reviews.author: TexasMommy

customer_reviews.title: Looks as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have not worn the shirt yet, but seems nice quality. I have other swim shirts from Lands End in small, but this brand runs smaller than that. The medium is nice, but it is a bit long for me.
customer_reviews.author: beach bum

customer_reviews.title: Love this shirt
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shirt after loving the long sleeve version last year. This shirt is comfortable, fits as expected, has multiple colors, dries quickly and protects from sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size or 2 bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Way too tight. I normally wear a small, size 4, but this has to be for a size 0. Neck and arm pits way too small. Color was nice. Company Would not exchange it for bigger size and I had bought it on sale at 1/3 the current price.
customer_reviews.author: Reilly Q

customer_reviews.title: fits like the model
customer_reviews.text: It fits just like the model. I'm no model. I am 5'10, not very busty, average weight, with a long torso. It ends right above my elbow and skims the bottoms just like the picture. Lightweight fabric feels cool to the skin. Interesting design on the front, the blue has swirls of white and darker blue on the left side. I can wear a bikini with sun coverage and modesty. It gets slightly darker when wet. You can barely see thru the material, so wear something underneath. Love them -- I think I got one in every color.
customer_reviews.author: Al V

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but only lasts a year
customer_reviews.text: This is a modest, comfortable swim top. Be aware, chlorine is tough on the thin fabric. Don't expect it to last for a second summer in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L H.

customer_reviews.title: Good protector! The white design will not last!!
customer_reviews.text: It protects from the sun and fits well as described. After only one wash (by hand) the white is starting to peel off which is unacceptable. I could have gotten a plain pink rashguard, but I wanted one with some design for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great swim top
customer_reviews.text: I love this swim shirt. I have a Roxy rash guard shirt that is incredibly tight. I wear a medium in t-shirts (and they are loose) so I ordered a large. I wanted to make sure that it was not as tight and hard to get on as my Roxy top. This one is thinner and MUCH more t-shirt like. Very flowing and not form fitting. The downfall is that it does float around in the water. But it is so hot here that it works perfect for me!! Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Lilyicu

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: Use it at the beach or pool for sun protection and it does a good job, just find the shirt is warm when it’s dry, more comfortable when the shirt is wet.
customer_reviews.author: loves pups

customer_reviews.title: Great Design and Colors
customer_reviews.text: Bought two Kanu Surf Rashguard shirts for my adult daughter to enjoy on a Hawaiian vacation. We had to go down to the smallest small size, and she still had room. It did not fit like skin. Really love the colors and happy with the sun protechion. No problem at all with exchanging for smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: india

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after I had tried another brand first. The other brand was very tight and heavy. This one has a bit more room and is much lighter weight, which is good when trying to keep cool. It's also a great color.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Rashguard
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rashguard to wear to a water park while 7 months pregnant. I usually am a size small and I bought a large. It fit well and covered my growing belly. I originally bought a maternity swim suit but was worried about "wardrobe malfunctions!'
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So great that I own two
customer_reviews.text: I also have one in the same color with long sleeves. I'm pleased with this purchase. I haven't worn it yet, bug I've worn the other one extensively and it does protect me from the sun and makes it easier to get into the water if it's chilly. I wear large and sometimes an extra large top (if fitted). I bought this in an extra large, because I didn't want it skin-tight. I recommend this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: North Country M.

customer_reviews.title: Beware larger chested women
customer_reviews.text: The material is nice and the design is good, but if you're large-chested (36DD) good luck, way to tight.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Siefert

customer_reviews.title: Cute, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, fits well, not too tight or loose. Long enough to not show belly. I like it a lot, perfect for vacations.
customer_reviews.author: DebJ

customer_reviews.title: Color is off but good overall
customer_reviews.text: I like the bright orange color so much That I also got a blue. But this time the color is much darker than photo. Overall good quality and fits like it should. I got a small and I’m 5,2 120 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: kylie

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable, rising up constantly
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear under my wetsuit while scuba diving. I wore them once and tossed them in the trash. The fit is okay but they ride up horribly. While I was walking around in them getting all my gear ready I had to keep pulling at them. I may have well just been wearing a bikini bottom. After these bottoms got wet the riding up was even worse. I couldn't hardly put my gear away for pulling on these shorts. I ended up having to change back into my clothes just so I could comfortably put my gear up. I wouldn't recommend these to my worst enemy.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: My previous Rash Guard shirt wore out after 5 years. I ordered this one to replace the previous one (I paid a lot more for my previous one) and I am Very satisfied with the Kanu shirt. It fits perfectly, looks great, and I hope to get a lot of use out it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: pretty good fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 4 usually. I purchased small fits great. A little tight on the arm sleeves. It's not super tight so it might ride up if you're surfing.
customer_reviews.author: Tankgirl

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fit and color. I usually wear a size small T-shirt and ordered a medium with the hopes of having room to move around, since a prefer a looser fit. It fits pretty loosely and lived up to my expectations. I like the longer sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Don't put this in the dryer
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a beach vacation last week. I washed it after each wear in cold water on a gentle cycle and hung it to dry. On the last day I put it in the dryer, coolest setting, according to manufacturer directions, but was disappointed to find that the appliques were peeling off. I'm going to return it since I followed laundering instructions. So word of caution: do not put this in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Material is comfortable and fit is great for a swim top. There is no cup support but that was expected since it wasn’t in the description. Overall for price and UV protection, I think it’s a great top!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This swim tee fits exactly as expected. It's not too tight, but it doesn't hang on me either. It's comfortable, and the raspberry color is even more beautiful in person than it looks in the photo. I purchased the shirt to wear on a cruise, and I am so glad I did. I went on an excursion that required me to wear a life preserver. The woman I was with ended up with welts under her arms from the jacket, but because of my shirt, I was welt free!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Clark

customer_reviews.title: it runs small
customer_reviews.text: It is uncomfortably small . Hopefully I will loose a little weight so it will fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: This combined with the leggings have allowed her to swim and enjoy water again
customer_reviews.text: Got this to go with surf leggings (swim tights) for a friend who would not come swimming or on the boat anymore because of being self-conscious. This combined with the leggings have allowed her to swim and enjoy water again. Yay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It fit like it was supposed to, great protection at the beach. Just a slightly snug in the arms but it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Beka

product_meta.title: Kanu Surf Women's Breeze UPF 50+ Short Sleeved Active Rashguard & Workout Top
product_meta.description: Kanu surf, a surf and swim lifestyle brand, is well known for great fit, function and colors along with high quality functional apparel for the whole family, all of our rash guards are quick dry and feature a upf 50 plus rating to block out the sun's harmful rays, kanu rash guards are designed for surfers of all levels as well as the recreational athlete, they are great for trips to the beach or the pool as well as for lounging around, matching styles for kids are also available so moms and kids can hit the beach scene as a team, available in xs, xl
feature_bullets: Short-sleeve swim tee with raglan seams and screen print at side waist
